active.name: Trinket
active.effects: Consume a charge to place a visible Effigy at the target location, which grants sight over the surrounding area for +type=level level seconds. For enemies, it visually appears identical to {{ci|Fiddlesticks}} (including on the minimap) and has no visible health bar until it activates. Enemy champions that approach it will activate it, causing it to automatically sound a Danger ping to its allies as well as fake a random action for up to 2 seconds. If not destroyed by that time, it will deal 1 damage to itself.
